subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Falcons owner, Arthur Blank, is trying to clean up the mess of his franchise after his star quarterback was sent to prison, his coach bolted and the team had redefined haplessness.
snippet: The Atlanta Falcons owner, Arthur Blank, is trying to clean up the mess of his franchise after his star quarterback was sent to prison, his coach bolted and the team had redefined haplessness.
